name: Hentai Puzzles: The Origin
description:
Meet Melissa, the bubbly and outgoing university schoolgirl who loves spending her free time at the beach. With her bright smile and infectious laughter, she's the life of the party and the center of attention wherever she goes. Melissa spends most of her days soaking up the sun, surfing the waves, and building sandcastles with friends. With her love for adventure and passion for life, spending time with Melissa is sure to be an unforgettable experience.



Introducing Amanda, the strict and efficient librarian who has a heart of gold. As a tsundere, Amanda may come across as cold and unapproachable, but deep down she has a soft spot for those who show an interest in literature. Whether it's finding the perfect book or recommending a hidden gem, Amanda is the ultimate tsundere librarian who will go to great lengths to help you discover the joy of reading. Are you ready to uncover the treasures within the library's walls with Amanda?

Features
  • High Quality Puzzles
  • Casual One Handed Gameplay ;)
  • Steam Achievements
